Inter::HarmonicL0Bond Class Reference
Bond Interactions

Detailed Description

A harmonic bond potential with zero rest length.

Definition at line 28 of file HarmonicL0Bond.h.

#include <HarmonicL0Bond.h>

Returns force/distance for one bond, for use in MD.

A positive return value represents a repulsive radial force.

Parameters:
rSqsquare of distance between bonded particles.
typetype of bond.
Returns:
scalar repulsive force divided by distance.

Definition at line 161 of file HarmonicL0Bond.h.

double Inter::HarmonicL0Bond::randomBondLength ( Random *  random,
double  beta,
int  type 
) const

Return bond length chosen from equilibrium distribution.

This function returns a bond length chosen from the Boltzmann distribution of lengths for bonds of random orientation. The distribution P(l) of values of the length l is proportional to l*l*exp[-beta*phi(l) ], where phi(l) is the bond energy.

Parameters:
randompointer to random number generator object.
betainverse temperature
typebond type
Returns:
random bond length chosen from equilibrium distribution.
